channel.title: Random event scaperune
channel.description: ok so im trying too add the random event in scaperune jail were you have to pop the balloon animals i got the lever working so that it tells you wat animal to pop with interface and everything i also got the balloon animals runing around so my question is what do i do for the option to pop balloon animal works when you actually click it (and this isn't nessesary but does anyone know how many balloon animals there actually are in the scaperune jail in real runescape?) *planning to release to community wen finished just to give back ;)

item.title: Random event scaperune
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Butchd12:

Does it not do anything when you click “pop”? Because you could just add a different feature to make it unique, if you cant do that or cant think of anything, you could just add a attack option and give them super low hp

i think i kno how to add an attack option but not sure and i kind of want them to have the pop balloon animal thing
and no it does nuthing

Read full topic
